saao/saa15/P334703
a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}{d}15-du-ri lu DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ ina UGU {LU₂}ša₂-EN.NUN ša LUGAL be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni ša {LU₂}ARAD-MEŠ ša LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ e-ga-ru-ni-ni ina ši-a-ri u₂-nam-ma-aš₂ {LU₂}MA₂.LAH₄-MEŠ a-ki an-ni-e iq-ṭi-bu-u-ni ma-a GIM pi-i-šu₂-u ni-il-lak ma-a ka-qu-ru la šal-mu šu₂-u ma-a {LU₂}par-ri-ṣu-u₂-te ša x x ina ŠA₃-bi x x ma-a pi-iq-ta-te x x x x i-šam-me x x x-MEŠ i-šap-par x x+x {GIŠ}MA₂-MEŠ i-pu-gu-na-a-ši x x-ma ina ID₂ x x x ša ap x+x x x x x la-al-lik x x x x+x la-din ina pa-an LUGAL EN-ia₂ ni-id-gul ma-a a-du E₂ LUGAL šum₂-ma a-na {URU}ŠE šum₂-ma a-na UNUG{KI} i-qar-rib-u₂-ni ma-a liš-pur-u-na-a-ši nu-nam-me-ša u₂-ma-a an-nu-rig a-na LUGAL EN-ia₂ a-sap-ra mi-i-nu ša LUGAL be-li₂ i-qab-bu-u-ni liš-pur-u-ni a-se-me ma-a DUMU {1}na-din x x x x x-am-me LUGAL x x x x x E₂ {1}ha-ri-ri x x x x-ni LUGAL x x x x x x i-sa-par-an-ni x x x x x x MAN x x x x x x x x {URU}pa-x+x x x x x x x x x x zu x x x x x x
